name: Pizza
description: A delicious Italian dish made with cheese, tomato sauce, and a variety of toppings.

name: Burger
description: A sandwich consisting of a cooked patty placed inside a sliced bun with lettuce, tomato, and condiments.

name: Sushi
description: A traditional Japanese dish made with vinegared rice, seafood, and vegetables.

name: Pasta
description: An Italian cuisine staple made from dough, often served with sauce, meat, or vegetables.

name: Biryani
description: A flavorful Indian rice dish cooked with spices, meat, or vegetables.

name: Tacos
description: A traditional Mexican food consisting of a folded tortilla filled with meat, beans, cheese, and vegetables.

name: Fried Rice
description: A popular Asian dish made by stir-frying rice with vegetables, eggs, and optional meat.

name: Noodles
description: A dish made with boiled or stir-fried noodles, often mixed with vegetables, sauces, and proteins.

name: Dosa
description: A South Indian thin crepe made from fermented rice and lentil batter, usually served with chutney and sambar.

name: Paneer Tikka
description: A popular Indian appetizer made from marinated cubes of paneer grilled with spices and vegetables.
